text: The South China Morning Post (SCMP) is an English-language newspaper based in Hong Kong. It has a Sunday edition called the Sunday Morning Post. It is owned by Alibaba Group. In 2016 there is a new owner for the newspaper. After that it has been alleged to be promoting China's power. == References == Category:English-language newspapers published in Asia Category:1903 establishments Category:1900s establishments in Asia Category:Organisations based in Hong Kong Category:Newspapers published in China
title: South China Morning Post
